content:
Hi everyone,

just in case anyone might be looking for a solution to export the Apple Watch ECG records to FHIR and transmit them afterwards, here you go:

https://github.com/ylboerner/Einthoven

Back when I developed the first version of this app, the HealthKit API was not available yet. This updated version makes full use of it now. In case anyone is looking to export any other HealthKit records to FHIR, the app might also be useful as a template :+1:
